commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wow! This is amazing! I have to do this, too!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Nico, what are you yelling about?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You'd be yelling, too! Take a look at this magazine!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let me see... Wow! School idols got to be station masters for a day?! What a wonderful event!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Right? It's the perfect event for me. Imagine, the galaxy's number one school idol cheering for all the commuters. Ooh, I can already see their happy faces.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It sounds fun. I want to try it, too.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hmm... Wait. School idols acting as station masters for a day...?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Whoa! I just thought of something I have to do. Sorry, everyone. Bye!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Mari? Where is she rushing off to?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It looks like she thought of something. Maybe she wants to have a one-day station master event, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Probably. She should've just told us! Well, I'm excited to wait and see what she does.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Why did Mari call us here out of the blue? Can we really be station masters for a day?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That would make me really happy. We have to work hard.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey, I'm the station master, got it? The rest of you can be station attendants.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh? I think we should all be station masters.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That would be a lot of masters. I wonder if I can do a good job. Rina-chan Board says, "Heart-pounding."

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: She's still not here.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, I wonder what happened.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Thanks for waiting, everyone!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh? Mari?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: *Sigh* I didn't think she'd actually get a train.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Dia, too! Why did you two come out of that train?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* That's because this train is ours to use!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: U-Umm. What are you talking about?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Come on! We were talking about cheering on commuters, weren't we? So I asked Papa for a teensy favor.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Girls, Mari is serious. She is really going to hold this event.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wh-What's going on? I don't think I follow.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We get to be train conductors for a day, just like you wanted! What do you think, Nico-chi?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I wanted to be a station master for a day, not a train conductor! How did it turn out like this?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Now, now, don't sweat the small stuff!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Besides, being a train conductor will be fun, too. It's still a station event.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We'll be able to do all sorts of things. I wonder what we can do to make everyone happy.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! Being a station master would be cool, but being a conductor will be fun for sure!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Good grief. She even got a train. I have no choice but to do this.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Fine. But we have to take this seriously. I'm going to make this the best one-day train conductor event ever!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Okay! Let's add our flair to this train!

commands.speaker: Honoka, Nico, Dia, Rina
commands.line: Yeah!
